channel.title: Log in message
channel.description:
What is the code to add the login message in the chatbox when you log in like, hello welcome to ****Scape, or something like that.
Thanks

item.title: Log in message
item.dc:creator: @lungxapples lungxapples
item.description:
@lungxapples wrote:

Uhm the problem was already solved stop trying to get reps nub…

Read full topic

item.title: Log in message
item.dc:creator: @xgreenxdogx xgreenxdogx
item.description:
@xgreenxdogx wrote:

open up client.java and when you logg in it will say that servers name Hit Ctrl+f and put “welcome to ****scape” then put that ever you want save and compile Hope this helped REP if it did ^^

Read full topic

item.title: Log in message
item.dc:creator: @yourusername yourusername
item.description:
@yourusername wrote:

[quote=“lungxapples, post:8, topic:329594”][quote author=yourusername link=topic=425974.msg3129025#msg3129025 date=1266272016]

[quote author=Zezerex link=topic=425974.msg3129023#msg3129023 date=1266271870]

Well if there is already something when you log in just search that and it should be in your client.java and change that to what you want then save and compile
[/quote]i have already search for it in client.java and even with zfile searcher but i still cannot find it!

what type of server?
ex: 317, 508
[/quote]it is a 317

In the client class then. Search the login message for whatever it says when you log in change to what you like save and compile.

L0L thats exactly what i said…[/quote]
i assume i said it simpler.

Read full topic
